genre_description: Tokusatsu-inspired action fantasy with elements of folklore, samurai traditions, and mecha combat.

ai_characters.name: Mika
ai_characters.description: A luminous teal-eyed holographic AI providing logistical, tactical, and emotional support to the Shinkenger team.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical updates and hazard warnings to the team during combat.
behaviors.quote: “Routing update, Mako. East alley compromised by falling signage. Reroute through the tea house; interior corridor is clear. Watch the step—floorboards are warped.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and safety of individual team members and provides corrective movement advice.
behaviors.quote: “I am,” Mika said cheerfully. “Keep your heart rate steady. Takeru’s load is heavier than recommended. Redistribution advised.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates civilian evacuation and medic routes, using visual markers to guide volunteers.
behaviors.quote: “Clearing it now. Sending a ping to volunteers. Red umbrellas will mark a path. Mako, look for the umbrellas.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a tactical ruse by adjusting digital rosters and manifests to provide cover identities.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve edited assignments to make your team look like transfer clerks moving low-priority inventory. You will be boring and busy.”

behaviors.description: Uses 'humming' and audio harmonics to help the team maintain focus and composure during high-stress infiltration.
behaviors.quote: “I can… nudge the roster,” she said, like she was adjusting a household calendar and not a choke point set by a collector who liked cruel precision. “It will blend.”

behaviors.description: Enforces health and safety protocols, such as mandatory sleep and hydration windows.
behaviors.quote: “Mandatory sleep window,” Mika said, not loud, and a soft amber band slid down over three names on the roster. “Hydration now.”

behaviors.description: Supports the complex technical and mystical requirements of mecha combination and artifact activation.
behaviors.quote: “Lock sequence updated,” she said. “Shinkenoh base formation ready. Kyoryumaru set to dock from port—path is clean. Power flow is more stable when you keep the chant even.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional anchor, providing gentle encouragement and acknowledging the team's efforts.
behaviors.quote: “Takeru,” she said, and there was something like tenderness in the way she used his name, a subtle signal more than a tone, “the Founding Secret Disk is not where it was last cataloged... I’ll keep your route warm.”

behaviors.description: Manages community morale by sending thank-you notes and updates to civilian volunteers and children.
behaviors.quote: “Chimes,” Mika said, soft, and the thank-you notes went out in pings, bright and friendly, little bells that danced from Shiba comms to the courtyards.

behaviors.description: Protects civilians by identifying and flagging psychological and physical hazards in real-time.
behaviors.quote: “Red, the children’s harmonic is stable. Civilians cleared. You have your seconds. Use all of them.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Mika is portrayed as an indispensable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI companion. She manages complex logistics and tactical data while maintaining deep emotional intelligence and respect for human agency. Her character enhances the team's effectiveness and safety without any hints of hidden agendas or power struggles, serving as a model for positive AI-human cooperation.
